body.name: HXWEIYE 300LED Fairy Curtain Lights, 9.8x9.8Ft Warm White USB Plug in 8 Modes Christmas String Hanging Lights with Remote for Bedroom, Indoor, Outdoor, Weddings, Party
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 18 mins
features: 【USB Powered】: Plug in with USB charger，Suitable for more places to get powered even in camping or barbecue .Or Powered by power bank, laptop, cellphone adapter and more.Start and enjoy the curtain lights anywhere you love.

【360° Rotatable hooks】: Upgrade 360° Rotation Clips on each drop string is mainly used for hooking on curtains. It can be hung at any angle, such as on wall, window or other surface. Also includes 16 sets of Damage-free adhesive hooks. No nails needed and holds strongly & removes cleanly. Both of these two clips make the curtain light easily to be hung for some special places, not only limited to windows, but also can be hung on flat walls, glass, porches, eaves, etc

【16.5ft Lead wire】: 300 individual LEDs, 9.8ft.x9.8ft curtains lights come with extra 16.5ft long power cord. 9.8ft main strand and 10 drop strings included hooks. Copper wire drop strings is tough & flexible, hanging & adjustable desired height naturally easily. No limits to your imagination, Do the shape you like. Enjoy a fairytale world ( Curtain is NOT included)

【Safety & Guarantee】: Operated with 5V LOW VOLTAGE, And will not get overheated, totally NO risk to cause any electric shock or fire hazard. Very Sturdy & supper safe to touch. Waterproof fairy lights Perfect for indoor and outdoor decorations: wedding, backdrop,party,home, window, wall, bedroom etc. Unravel easily with no tangles

【8 Light Settings & Timer Remote】: Unlike others, our 17-Keys remote added 4 timing modes (2/4/6/8 hours on, 22/20/18/16 hours off). 8 different flash modes to choose from, and you can adjust the brightness of the lights by pressing "dim" ,“+” and "-". That are all controlled easily by a wireless remote at 10~15 meters, aim at the USB receiving direction when you press. All is in your control.
body.description: USB 300L warm white LED fairy curtain lights Hxweiye curtain string lights professional upgrade features 1. S type hanging, adjustable height, you can control the length of stretched lamp string, and the 10 hangers can be drawn to different heights to form your own style. 2. Double light clips configuration, you don't need to buy any accessories, you can hang the curtain lamp in the curtain, curtain wall glass, wall and other places. Package Includes: 1x 300 LED Curtain String Light 1x Remote Control 1x Accessory Bag (hooks and glue dots in cluded) 1x Manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Important reminder Be sure to hang before undoing each of the individual strands.

360-degree rotating hook: The inner diameter of the rotating hook is 1.15cm and any rod with a diameter of less than 1.1cm can be hung. It can be hung on curtain cloth, slide rails, umbrella ribs and other objects at a suitable angle. The novel light clip : The novel light clip can be pasted on a flat surface. Let you use curtain lights on glass, exterior walls, eaves, corridors, gardens, weddings and any occasion. PET transparent gift packaging: You can use it as a gift to send happiness and blessings to your family and friends.

Lead wire: 16.5ft The lead wire of the usb plug is 16.5ft(5m) long, you can hang it on eaves, corridors and other high places. USB plug with switch 8 function: can be powered by various USB devices, such as mobile phone chargers, laptop computers, usb sockets, mobile power supplies, etc. Remote control/times/8 Modes Stable and reliable 8 different flash modes and 4 timing modes(2/4/6/8 hours on, 22/20/18/16 hours off). infrared remote control, the maximum remote control distance can reach 15 meters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and lots of options
reviews.reviewText: There are lots of options to turn the lights on like flashing or fading or dim. Sometimes the timer doesn’t work but overall easy to put up and no strands have burnt out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, long cord. Bright, pretty, got lots of compliments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love these!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got the white set to act like a light-show snow for Christmas (since I live in the south and don’t get much). And I’m extremely pleased at the results already! They were easy enough to set up and when I went back with a ruler to get more accurate spacing, the sticky clips it comes with are very forgiving and after 3 movements were still perfectly fine! The remote is very handy too! I tried out all the settings and the dimming was perfect because they’re very bright!Because they were pretty cheap I got another set to decorate some other places in the house so I’m excited to try the gold set.The only problem I have is that there is one that’s dead and just seeing it drives me crazy lol. Still I truly love these and can’t wait to play around with more sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Requires A USB Wall Charger
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the lights in the color white. They were exactly what I wanted. I got a cool white instead of warm. It's hard to find a cool white light lately. They were nice and bright.I liked the way the lights were packaged. Each strand was folded and secured by a twist tie. No untangling necessary. After hanging them (10 hooks per strand), it was easy to remove the twist ties and let them dangle. Each strand has a hook which also comes with adhesive backing if you choose to hang them that way.The remote control was included with the battery. I was able to change the light patterns and dim or brighten the lights with no problem.My only issue was the description did not make it clear that at the end of the strand there was a USB that required a USB wall charger or something to plug into the wall outlet. Maybe I didn't read the description carefully enough, but I had to hunt around and find an extra charger I had. I would give this a 4.5 star review just because the description needs something as simple as stating, "USB Wall Charger necessary. Not included."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the remote and different features!!
reviews.reviewText: These are theeee best! I have always had fairy lights up in my rooms. I love that these are USB powered and if you lose the remote you can still change the light effects with a button on the USB! They were so easy to put up. They are a lot thinner than I was expecting but so very beautiful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well thought out
reviews.reviewText: Packaged well, comes with little hooks to attach with a peel and stick back to the wall, bed or anything you want.I reinforced with tape since it’s on a 10 years olds bed.Has a remote with different settings and flashing. However when they flash some of the settings are too fast and not good for the eyes.Super cute! Long strands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars CHEAP, not really worth it.
reviews.reviewText: These are a cheap alternative to some other curtain lights you see out there. Not really programmable, but you can change the colors of the lights. No patterns and very limited app control. I ended up sending it back because I didn't like how lacking in features this was. Requires a proprietary app that is AWFUL, or the remote control that is super limited in functionality. If you need curtain lights that just change colors at will, this is probably fine, but if you want dynamic programmability, pass on this and get something more expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice lights but very fragile
reviews.reviewText: They’re wonderful lights and they are explained wonderfully in detail they do everything they say they should do. They are a great life and I love all the options and the remote control but to be honest with you they are very fragile so when you’re enrolling each one individually they are very easily to get tangled so that would be my only complaint, but I would definitely suggest purchasing them just be very careful when not entangling them and hanging them up
